titleStmt.title: John W. Woodward et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG11140

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
Jany 31st 1862 Metcalfe County Ky
To Your Excellency

Govener Beriah Mcgoffin your petioner Wm R Terry haveing Bin Indbted & Judgment Rendered against him in the Barren Equity & criminal Court on the Testimony of only one witness sd Terry your Petitoner was accused of Being guilty of keeping a Tipling house for a Least Three months in succession,, your petioner Is a farmer and a crippled man he has a small farm and a wife & Four children he is a pore But honest hard working Inoffenceive man of Civil habits and a good Neighbor and we the undersigned do Believe that he deserves Yourthe clemency vested in you by the Laws of Ky your petitioner sends this petition to you Greeting & praying you to Release his fine also pleading to be not Guilty of the charges made against him and the undersigned do here by set our Names as Testimony & are of the Belief that your petitioner Is Innocent of those charges made against him an Richly Deserves your clemency --

Names
Jno W Woodward
Julius Woodward
J. D. Baird
A Sirey
C,, W,, Clark
A. B. Clark
Reuben S Edwards
T J Edwards
John R Edwards
James J Clark
Edmend H Clark
Jonathan Clark
Burid Hensley
Names
Thos E Young
Samuel R Young
John W. Hensley
Robert Shirley
Samuel Hensley
Wm P Estes
Wm S. Smith
Henry. Clark
Joseph. Henry
James.R. Henry
Thomas. Henry
James L. Strong
Samuel W. Scott
Names
Anderson Farrell
Milton Willis
John. P Withrow
John M Yates
W D Counts
Names
Send to J M Yates at Columbia care H C Reed

Ru T. T. Alexander
Barren E & C Ct
Remitted
B. M.
$60 } Tipiling
Wm R. Terry
Issd Feby 25th 1862
